p: Nutritional composition of Cashew kernel samples ( Anacardium occidentale L.) obtained from Burkina Faso, a landlocked country in West Africa, was previously detected [ 30]. Briefly, 100 g of cashew kernel samples containing moisture 4.86 g, protein 21.01 g, lipids (total) 44.70 g, dietary fiber (total) 3.86 g, sugars (total) 32.80 g, ash 2.68 g, and total phenols 69.64 mg.
